meanings.definition: The position or rank of a sergeant.
meanings.sent1: In the army, achieving sergeancy requires hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The sergeancy in the police force is earned through years of service.
meanings.sent3: The new recruit was excited to finally reach sergeancy and lead a team.
meanings.sent4: His promotion to sergeancy felt like reaching the peak of a mountain after a long climb.
meanings.sent5: The bright stripes on his uniform symbolized his sergeancy status.

meanings.definition: The duties or responsibilities of a sergeant.
meanings.sent1: The sergeancy involves overseeing the training of new recruits.
meanings.sent2: She handled the sergeancy with efficiency and professionalism.
meanings.sent3: The sergeant's sergeancy included organizing daily briefings with the team.
meanings.sent4: Taking on the sergeancy meant taking on a great deal of responsibility.
meanings.sent5: Her dedication to her sergeancy inspired others to work harder.
